TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. IT'S STILL FLIPPIN BUGGY.

Also: Super, why.

I wish for doyulble.s

Granted, but the person in question does not know what doyulble.s is, and gives you a glass portable toilet instead.

I wish nobody I know is incompetent, stupid and ignorant.

Granted, you are now the last person alive on Earth.

I wish I had a new car.

Granted, but it is constructed in a manner akin to that of a Prince Rupert's Drop, with the entire exterior forming the "tail" of the drop. Goodbye.

I wish for some food.

Granted, but it is actually a holographic sandwich

that one was too easy...

I wish the universe would never end (as in heat death, accelerating expansion, etc.)

Granted. As soon as the first race to perfect it activates the Universal Immortality Machine, the universe freezes in place. Time does not pass.

I wish for quintuple cupcakes!

Granted. After eating them, you morph into Joseph Merrick

Iwishmyspacebarwasn'tstuck.

Granted. Joseph Merrick finally, mercifully, dies. Twice.

I wish for double fish wishes from the fish of glory, Mr. Fish.

Granted, but Mr. Fish forgets about the wishes.

I wish for a wish about a wish, about a wish.

Granted, but you went too deep and you're now stuck in wish limbo.

I wish for stockalike mods.

Granted, all other mods and plugins disappear.

I wish for a football

Granted, it hits you in the groin at high speed.

I wish there were no animated gifs.

Granted, all other formats are now animated, including text files.

I wish for either a decent beard growth or nothing at all.

Granted, all other mods and plugins disappear.

I am totally okay with this.

granted, the beard becomes sentient and begins to attack you

i wish that all humans were evolve into a energy beings right now

Edited May 16, 2014 by Helix935
ninja'd

Granted, all humans turn into energy, releasing 4.509Ãƒâ€”10^28 joules, equal to 673 trillion times the energy output of Little Boy when dropped on Hiroshima. Not a great day for planet Earth.

I wish for one kg of unbihexium.

Granted. It appears in your colon.

I wish for Superman's powers.

granted, but because superman is a fictious entity, your new powers are confused and explode.

I wish for a wish that can wish for other wishes that can wish for wishes.

Granted. It wishes to die for once.

I wiisih or the thinger.

No wish was made. Your skin will be slowly peeled from your face, one small strip at a time.

I wish for uniformity.

Granted. The universe is a uniform pancake.

I wish for cupcakes! Many cupcakes.

Granted. You drown and get crushed by a cupcake tsunami.

I wish for more rep.

Granted, you complete one more repetition and collapse to the ground in a heap of dehydration and sweat.

I wish that no-one can nibble-ise.

Granted. Everyone starves, because they cannot eat food, nibble or otherwise.

I wish for a PAL9001.

Granted. He's your plastisteel durasilicon PAL! also there are 9001 of him, and he's 8 square megameters in size.

I wish for trouble cuvppe.s

Granted, but still noone knows what you're asking for so you get a flat soda instead.

I wish for non eternal mudkips.
